page.title: 17ROADS
page.content: IN THIS AREA, THERE ARE FOUR{A-CLASS {ROADS.}THERE ARE THE A572, A5082, A577 AND THE A580.THEY JOIN ALL THE LOCAL TOWNS AND THEY ALL LEAD INTO MANCHESTER.THERE ARE THREE PRIMARY{ {B-CLASS ROADS}WHICH ARE NOT MARKED WITH NUMBERS.ONE IS{PRINCESS AVENUE, ONE IS{COACH ROAD }AND THE OTHER IS {HIGHER GREEN LANE.}ALL THE OTHER ROADS ARE ESTATE ROADS WHICH LEAD AROUND THE HOUSING AREA OF BODMIN ROAD, STOUR ROAD, WITHINGTON DRIVE, COACH ROAD, CROSS HILLOCK AND HIGHER GREEN.THE ROADS ARE MADE BY PUTTING A LAYER OF TAR DOWN,AND ON SOME ROADS,{SMALL {STONES}ARE LAID DOWN ON TOP OF THE TAR. IN TIME,THE STONES SINK INTO THE TAR. ON THE NEW EXTENSION OF STOUR RD A FEW OF THE STONES ARE QUITE LARGE.FRESHLY LAID CHIPPINGS CAN DAMAGE {VEHICLES.
